item.title: VCARD QR Codes in Inkscape
item.description: A Inkscape plugin to generate VCARD QR Codes. This work is based on a inkscape plugin by Sergey Vedernikov, in turn based on the work of others. My version is a little modification to the plugin that Sergey proposed in a Inkscape forum. I generate a VCARD (the plugin interface is consistent) that contains a field for the website and not the birthday of the contact. In my opinion this is much better to use the plugin to generate QR Codes for business cards.

item.title: Apprenons Python
item.description: Apprenons Python Apprenons Python en jouant is a website I built to keep track of a trip into teaching Python programming to kids. The site started as a way to respond to the innocent question from my son and one of his friends: How do you write a video game. We started this trip a couple of years ago and since then we have explored the world of text based gaming, graphics based gaming, web development, physical computing (with the raspberry pi) etc.

item.title: Data Science day by day
item.description: Data Science day by day Data Science day by day is my Data Science learning blog. In 2015, I started learning about Data Science and ML, being a seasoned IT Professional it did not sound at all new to me. But I wanted to learn and to keep up to date with the most recent developments, I wanted to brush up my stats and maths, I wanted to be current (or as current as I can).
